title: Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition
notes: Full clip edition crashes and only a black screen is shown. Did set it to window mode to avoid the fullscreen XWayland bug of not showing any output of Vulkan, but didn't help.

title: Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition

notes: Tested with PROTON_USE_WINED3D, PROTON_NO_D3D11 and PROTON_NO_ESYNC. After the splash screen, my screen gets black and nothing happens. When I close the game using Alt+F4, the crash reporter of the game is launched.
title: Bulletstorm: Full Clip Edition

notes: This version is borked, but if you have the original GFWL release you can play the single player campaign by using a custom xlive.dll (https://community.pcgamingwiki.com/files/file/576-bulletstorm-xlivedll/).
